other_tests.findings: Mild proliferative glomerulonephritis with crescents, segmental nodular glomerulosclerosis, diffuse linear immunofluorescence reactivity for IgG along the GBM, moderate tubular atrophy, and widespread endothelial-cell injury.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial ELISA for anti-GBM antibodies was negative; however, antibodies were subsequently detected using Western blot analysis.

other_tests.findings: Initial test negative; later tested positive via Western blot analysis for anti-GBM antibodies.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Change from negative to positive for anti-GBM antibodies detected with a more sensitive test.

other_tests.findings: Hematuria (4+ to numerous red blood cells), proteinuria (3+), granular casts and red-cell casts observed.
